SqlDefinition.SqlCommand: UPDATE emailbccaccountcategory SET ID=@@ID@@ <%=,Name=@@Name@@%><%=,Sort=@@Sort@@%><%=,CreateTime=@@CreateTime@@%><%=,LastTime=@@LastTime@@%> WHERE ID=@@ID@@;

SELECT ebac.ID,ebac.Name,ebac.Sort,ebac.CreateTime,ebac.LastTime FROM emailbccaccountcategory AS ebac WHERE 1=1 <%= AND ebac.ID=@@ID@@%> <%= AND ebac.Name=@@Name@@%> <%= AND ebac.Sort=@@Sort@@%> <%= AND ebac.CreateTime=@@CreateTime@@%> <%= AND ebac.LastTime=@@LastTime@@%>;

SELECT ebac.ID,ebac.Name,ebac.Sort,ebac.CreateTime,ebac.LastTime FROM emailbccaccountcategory AS ebac WHERE 1=1 <%= AND ebac.ID=@@ID@@%> <%= AND ebac.Name=@@Name@@%> <%= AND ebac.Sort=@@Sort@@%> <%= AND ebac.CreateTime=@@CreateTime@@%> <%= AND ebac.LastTime=@@LastTime@@%> LIMIT <R%= @@StartIndex@@, @@SelectCount@@ %R> ; SELECT COUNT(0) AS row_count FROM emailbccaccountcategory AS ebac WHERE 1=1 <%= AND ebac.ID=@@ID@@%> <%= AND ebac.Name=@@Name@@%> <%= AND ebac.Sort=@@Sort@@%> <%= AND ebac.CreateTime=@@CreateTime@@%> <%= AND ebac.LastTime=@@LastTime@@%>;
